name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: The girls are cheering and excited at the shop before the festival starts.
A school announcement from the clock tower marks the beginning of the Dorm Festival.
The girls realize the festival is starting and rush to prepare.
Title animation for 'Nepolabo Gakuen: 5th Anniversary!! Shining Dorm Festival'.
In the rehearsal room, the girls decide to perform a medley of their original songs.

subtitles.original: わあー！イエーイ！よろしくお願いします！ねー！
subtitles.english: Waaa! Yay! Please take care of us! Right!

subtitles.original: それでは──これより、学寮祭を開始いたします
subtitles.english: Well then... the Dorm Festival will now begin.

subtitles.original: ご来場の皆様、どうぞ最後までお楽しみください
subtitles.english: To all our visitors, please enjoy until the very end.

subtitles.original: やばい学寮祭始まるって！
subtitles.english: Oh no, the Dorm Festival is starting!

subtitles.original: ねねたちも行かなきゃ！
subtitles.english: We have to go too!

subtitles.original: 結局、何も買えなかったんだけど！
subtitles.english: We ended up not buying anything though!

subtitles.original: しゃーなし。戻って学寮祭の話しますか…
subtitles.english: Can't be helped. Shall we go back and talk about the festival?

subtitles.original: ででこれは…何をしているの？？
subtitles.english: So, um... what are we doing??

subtitles.original: ねねたちには、歌とダンスしかない！！ならばギリギリまで、全力で練習するしかないでしょー！！
subtitles.english: All we have is singing and dancing!! So we have no choice but to practice with all our might until the last second!!

subtitles.original: もうお客さん入っているけどね(笑)
subtitles.english: But the audience is already inside (laughs)

subtitles.original: あああ、もうやるしかない！！
subtitles.english: Ah, geez, we just have to do it!!

subtitles.original: でもさ、肝心の何やるかを決めてないのでは？
subtitles.english: But wait, haven't we decided on the most important thing: what we're going to do?
(Thinking...)

subtitles.original: ……でさ、お客さんたちも見たいのってやっぱり私たちらしさだよね
subtitles.english: But you know, what the audience wants to see is... well, something that's "us," right?

subtitles.original: それなら…オリ曲じゃない？
subtitles.english: In that case... wouldn't it be our original songs?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、全部やろう！！
subtitles.english: Then, let's do all of them!!
Again!?

subtitles.original: 1つじゃダメダメっ！衣装もぜーいん着替えて、たくさん歌おうよ！！
subtitles.english: Just one isn't enough! Let's change into all our costumes and sing lots of songs!!

subtitles.original: メドレーってこと！？いいじゃんそれ！！
subtitles.english: You mean a medley!? Oh, that sounds great!!

subtitles.original: あぁ～～、いいかも。
subtitles.english: Ah~~, that might be good.

subtitles.original: で、順番はどうするの？？
subtitles.english: And what about the order??

subtitles.original: そんなんパッションでどうにかなるなるっ！！
subtitles.english: Something like that will work out with passion!!

subtitles.original: こりゃ大変なことになりそうですね。
subtitles.english: This looks like it's going to be quite an ordeal.
Ummm...

subtitles.original: ししろん？どうしたの？？
subtitles.english: Shishiron? What's wrong??

subtitles.original: いや、何か忘れている気がするんだけど……思い出せない。
subtitles.english: No, I feel like I'm forgetting something... but I can't remember.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫大丈夫っ！これを歌えば学寮祭は、ねねたちのものっ！！
subtitles.english: It's okay, it's okay! If we sing this, the Dorm Festival will be ours!!

subtitles.original: よっしゃいくぞー！！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go!!

subtitles.original: 私たちらしさ見せるよ！
subtitles.english: We'll show them our true colors!

subtitles.original: うんっ、とりあえず、やるだけやろう！せーのっ！
subtitles.english: Yeah, for now, let's just do what we can! One, two!

subtitles.original: ねぽらぼメドレー！！
subtitles.english: Nepolabo Medley!!

subtitles.original: 手を上げて Clap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands, clap your hands, to the other side of the ocean

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it reaches you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 光射す 僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: The light shines on our future

subtitles.original: 始めようか さあ Diving
subtitles.english: Shall we begin, now diving

subtitles.original: 待っても意味ない Timing
subtitles.english: No point in waiting, timing

subtitles.original: でもたまに止まって Thinking Thinking
subtitles.english: But sometimes stop and think, thinking

subtitles.original: 変えてみせる Change
subtitles.english: I'll show I can change it, change

subtitles.original: 踏み出すのさ Stepping
subtitles.english: Step forward, stepping

subtitles.original: 掴んでみせるよ キラキラ My Dream
subtitles.english: I'll show I can grab it, my sparkling dream

subtitles.original: 叶う日まで Story 繋ぐから
subtitles.english: Until the day it comes true, I'll connect the story

subtitles.original: だって君に ずっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: Because I want you to watch me forever

subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it reaches you

subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.english: Come on, together everybody

subtitles.english: Clap your hands, to the other side of the sky

subtitles.english: Clap your hands, so it resonates

subtitles.original: Hyper Jumpin' Now
subtitles.english: Hyper Jumpin' Now

subtitles.original: Hyper Jumpin'
subtitles.english: Hyper Jumpin'

subtitles.original: 子供くらい はしゃぐ方がお得でしょ
subtitles.english: It's better to frolic around like a child

subtitles.original: 低気圧から 追い上がっていくテンション
subtitles.english: Tension rising from the low pressure

subtitles.original: このままスピード加速して
subtitles.english: Just like this, accelerate the speed

subtitles.original: たどり着く先に 何があるんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder what lies at the end

subtitles.original: 止まらない気持ちは 助走つけて
subtitles.english: Accelerating the feelings that won't stop

subtitles.original: 次元を超えて行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go beyond dimensions

subtitles.original: さあ Hyper Jumpin' 飛び跳ねよう
subtitles.english: Now, Hyper Jumpin', let's leap

subtitles.original: ハイになって灰になるまで Dash and Shake it up
subtitles.english: Get high until you're ash, dash and shake it up

subtitles.original: Hyper Jumpin' 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Hyper Jumpin', to the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: もっと もっと 近づきたいの
subtitles.english: I want to get closer and closer

subtitles.original: Woh... ドキドキしたい Gimmie Gimmie Gimmie 愛
subtitles.english: Woh... I want my heart to race, gimmie gimmie gimmie love

subtitles.original: Wohoo... もっと もっと 高く飛びたいの
subtitles.english: Wohoo... I want to jump higher and higher

subtitles.original: This is No No 好きなら More More More
subtitles.english: This is no no, if you like it more, more, more

subtitles.original: 邪魔するノイズは 打ち消せ Bang Bang Bang
subtitles.english: Cancel out the distracting noise, bang bang bang

subtitles.original: 遊びたいだけ アンチは無視して
subtitles.english: I just want to play, ignore the haters

subtitles.original: 笑い飛ばして 蹴っ飛ばせ Kick it!
subtitles.english: Laugh it off and kick it away! Kick it!

subtitles.original: Jump Around!!
subtitles.english: Jump Around!!

subtitles.original: Hyper Jumpin' Now
subtitles.english: Hyper Jumpin' Now
